sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO(
BY_WATCHERS_NAME, BY_WATCHERS_ID, WATCH_ID,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME, ORG, ORG_TREE) values(
#byWatchersName#, #byWatchersId#, #watchId#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #org#, #orgTree#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.BY_WATCHERS_NAME AS byWatchersName, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.BY_WATCHERS_ID AS byWatchersId, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.WATCH_ID AS watchId,
TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.ID AS id, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.STATUS AS status, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.CREATED AS created, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.UPDATED AS updated, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO where TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO
BY_WATCHERS_NAME=#byWatchersName# BY_WATCHERS_ID=#byWatchersId# WATCH_ID=#watchId#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.BY_WATCHERS_NAME AS byWatchersName, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.BY_WATCHERS_ID AS byWatchersId, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.WATCH_ID AS watchId,
TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.ID AS id, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.STATUS AS status, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.CREATED AS created, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.UPDATED AS updated, TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO WHERE TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO WHERE TB_BY_WATCHERS_INFO.STATUS = '1'
